extra:
This new release includes more polishing changes and bug fixes. We are most excited about our new release schedule, we are now using Firefox's Release Candidates for twilight, meaning we can test out new Firefox versions before they are released to the public. This will allow us to fix any issues before they are released to the public.

It may be a bit late, but happy new year! We hope you have a great year ahead of you!
fixes: Fixed compact mode sidebar not hiding fully on some occasions
Fixed context menu checkbox icon aligments for Windows users
Fixed having multiple windows displaying the wrong essentials at startup

fixes.description: Fixed toolbar jittering when in compact mode
Fixed grain texture not being clipped at window corners
Fixed arrow keys not working after opening an extension popup
Fixed animation for opening popups cliping their content
Fixed weird colouring for toggle inputs

fixes: Update application identifier for Zen Browser to align with new naming conventions (MacOS)
Fixed translations trying to be overriden on Windows builds

fixes.description: Fixed web panels closing and inmediately opening again when clicking on the toolbar button

fixes: Fix margin for titlebar buttonbox in OSX theme

fixes.description: Fixed on-boarding search engine icons having large sizes
Fixed preferences sidebar hidding on smaller screens

fixes: Fixed coloring issue on tree elements such as search engine selection on the preferences page
Fixed pinning and unpinning extensions messing up the toolbar

fixes.description: Fixed duplicating a tab showing the default workspace container indicator
Fixed common issues on the on-boarding pages such as button backgrounds and spacing

fixes: Fixed visibility issues when selecting multiple essentials
Fixed syncing workspaces on some specific scenarios
Fixed glance buttons not being able to be clicked
Fixed horizontal spacing issues when using split views

fixes.description: Fixed naming issues between sidebar and web panels

fixes: Fixed moving pinned tabs into the essential tabs container breaking the UI
Improved security for Zen Mods, only allowing installs from the Zen Mods website
Fixed the completly broken save bookmark dialog
Fixed and improved the grain texture for workspace backgrounds (Thanks to @different55)

fixes.description: Fixed touch security not working on macos

fixes: Fixed zen's app bundle ID giving an incorrect identifier
Fixed issue related to changing workspace with the 4 / 5 mouse buttons and we now take into consideration natural scrolling
Fixed some website dialogs overflowing the window
Fixed moving around pins not saving their position after a restart

fixes.description: Fixed extension Pin to Toolbar overlayed with gtk theme toggle
Fixed opening home page instead of newtab when closing the last workspace tab

fixes: Fixed essential icon not appearing on the context menu
Fixed accessibility issues on some native links
Fixed compact mode not closing when opening an extension dialog pinned to the sidebar
Fixed windows 11 titlebar looking weird when having a custom accent color
Fixed workspaces icons appearing on private mode once opening another window

fixes.description: Fixed having invalid shortcuts hard-locking the user inside the loading screen

fixes: Fixed weird UI when dragging essentials around, making them look like they are clipping out of the view
features: Added transitioning when changing between workspaces backgrounds
Added support for Windows 11 setting 'Show accent color on window title bars and borders'
Enabled experimental features for twilight builds
Improved design of native zen dialogs
Improved on-boarding experience for new users
Added support for searching for emojis on the workspace icon picker
Added support for MacOS smart cards
Color picker dialog will now convert to a valid color if it's hex-like but invalid
Made workspace switching tab's animation smoother
breakingChanges: Changed versioning scheme to match Firefox's Release Candidates
